text: Mark Emery Udall (born July 18, 1950) is an American politician. He was the United States Senator from Colorado from 2009 to 2015. He is a member of the Democratic Party. Before the Senate, he was in the United States House of Representatives, representing . ==References== ==Other websites== * Senator Mark Udall official U.S. Senate site (archived) * Mark Udall for Colorado Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from New Mexico Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:Politicians from Tucson, Arizona Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark Udall
